Hi,

setup a linux 2.6.18 debian box last night running heritrix 1.12.1 on
=
sun jdk1.6.0_03 with 1100 Mbs of heap size (-Xmx1100M).
had my crawl job cr=
eating script setup to allow max 4 instances
running at the same time. one =
of the instances is heritrix instance
itself, the other 3 are created and a=
ssigned one job each by using jmx
client interface during runtime. heritrix=
 instance is not assigned any
job, just used for monitoring the processes. =
and when the job
finishes, controller script sends a destroy command to rel=
evant instance. 

last time this setup worked for almost one week without s=
tack errors.
this time i got outofmemoryerror in 7 hours.

this is jmap -hi=
sto output.
http://www.students.itu.edu.tr/~altunyurt/heritrix_jmap_output.=
txt

and order.xml
http://www.students.itu.edu.tr/~altunyurt/order.xml

any=
 suggestions?
